Thanks for wonderful crawler.  I am trying to figure out the way to
crawl the website (domain scope) + 1 external hop, not only the
embedded image, also the html links.

I have been messing with SurtScope, surtfilter + pathdepth filter on
prefetch processor with broad scope.  Not much luck, ends up crawling
everything until max-link-hop reach.

I read through on the wiki about NewScopingModel and problems with
current scope.

Any pointer or direction would be really appreciated.
